data_table.description: Observed Performance from MRI Neuropsychological Battery, Original and Offspring Cohorts through 2005

variable.name: shareid
variable.description: UNIQUE PARTICIPANT ID

variable.name: idtype
variable.description: COHORT IDENTIFIER

variable.name: mri330
variable.description: SIDE BY SIDE: HELD FOR 10 SECONDS (PHYSICAL FUNCTION TEST: SIDE-BY-SIDE, SEMI-TANDEM, AND TANDEM STANDS)

variable.name: mri331
variable.description: SIDE BY SIDE: NUMBER OF SECONDS HELD IF LESS THAN 10 (RANGE=0-9, 88) (PHYSICAL FUNCTION TEST: SIDE-BY-SIDE, SEMI-TANDEM, AND TANDEM STANDS)

variable.name: mri332
variable.description: SIDE BY SIDE: NOT ATTEMPTED (PHYSICAL FUNCTION TEST: SIDE-BY-SIDE, SEMI-TANDEM, AND TANDEM STANDS)

variable.name: mri333
variable.description: SEMI-TANDEM: HELD FOR 10 SECONDS (PHYSICAL FUNCTION TEST: SIDE-BY-SIDE, SEMI-TANDEM, AND TANDEM STANDS)

variable.name: mri334
variable.description: SEMI-TANDEM: NUMBER OF SECONDS HELD IF LESS THAN 10 (RANGE=0-9, 88) (PHYSICAL FUNCTION TEST: SIDE-BY-SIDE, SEMI-TANDEM, AND TANDEM STANDS)

variable.name: mri335
variable.description: SEMI-TANDEM: NOT ATTEMPTED (PHYSICAL FUNCTION TEST: SIDE-BY-SIDE, SEMI-TANDEM, AND TANDEM STANDS)

variable.name: mri336
variable.description: TANDEM: HELD FOR 10 SECONDS (PHYSICAL FUNCTION TEST: SIDE-BY-SIDE, SEMI-TANDEM, AND TANDEM STANDS)

variable.name: mri337
variable.description: TANDEM: NUMBER OF SECONDS HELD IF LESS THAN 10 (RANGE=0-9, 88) (PHYSICAL FUNCTION TEST: SIDE-BY-SIDE, SEMI-TANDEM, AND TANDEM STANDS)

variable.name: mri338
variable.description: TANDEM: NOT ATTEMPTED (PHYSICAL FUNCTION TEST: SIDE-BY-SIDE, SEMI-TANDEM, AND TANDEM STANDS)

variable.name: mri339
variable.description: FIRST WALK: WALK TIME (IN SECONDS) (RANGE=01-59) (MEASURED WALKS - FIRST WALK, SECOND WALK AND QUICK WALK)

variable.name: mri340
variable.description: FIRST WALK: NOT ATTEMPTED (MEASURED WALKS - FIRST WALK, SECOND WALK AND QUICK WALK)
variable.value: unable to walk without assistive device

variable.name: mri341
variable.description: SECOND WALK: WALK TIME (IN SECONDS) (RANGE=01-59) (MEASURED WALKS - FIRST WALK, SECOND WALK AND QUICK WALK)

variable.name: mri342
variable.description: SECOND WALK: NOT ATTEMPTED (MEASURED WALKS - FIRST WALK, SECOND WALK AND QUICK WALK)
variable.value: unable to walk without assistive device

variable.name: mri343
variable.description: QUICK WALK: WALK TIME (IN SECONDS) (RANGE=01-59) (MEASURED WALKS - FIRST WALK, SECOND WALK AND QUICK WALK)

variable.name: mri344
variable.description: QUICK WALK: NOT ATTEMPTED (MEASURED WALKS - FIRST WALK, SECOND WALK AND QUICK WALK)
variable.value: unable to walk without assistive device

variable.name: mri345
variable.description: TIME TO COMPLETE FIVE STANDS (MINUTES) (RANGE=0-1) (REPEATED CHAIR STANDS)

variable.name: mri346
variable.description: TIME TO COMPLETE FIVE STANDS (SECONDS) (RANGE=0-59) (REPEATED CHAIR STANDS)

variable.name: mri347
variable.description: IF LESS THAN FIVE STANDS, ENTER THE NUMBER (RANGE=0-4) (REPEATED CHAIR STANDS)

variable.name: mri348
variable.description: STOOD WITHOUT USING ARMS (REPEATED CHAIR STANDS)

variable.name: mri349
variable.description: WAS THIS TEST COMPLETED? (REPEATED CHAIR STANDS)

variable.name: mri350
variable.description: IF NOT, WHY? (REPEATED CHAIR STANDS)

variable.name: mri356
variable.description: TRIAL 1 - RIGHT (HAND GRIP STRENGTH TEST)

variable.name: mri357
variable.description: TRIAL 2 - RIGHT HAND (HAND GRIP STRENGTH TEST)

variable.name: mri358
variable.description: TRIAL 3 - RIGHT HAND (HAND GRIP STRENGTH TEST)

variable.name: mri359
variable.description: BEST TRIAL - RIGHT HAND (HAND GRIP STRENGTH TEST)

variable.name: mri360
variable.description: TRIAL 1 - LEFT HAND (HAND GRIP STRENGTH TEST)

variable.name: mri361
variable.description: TRIAL 2 - LEFT HAND (HAND GRIP STRENGTH TEST)

variable.name: mri362
variable.description: TRIAL 3 - LEFT HAND (HAND GRIP STRENGTH TEST)

variable.name: mri363
variable.description: BEST TRIAL - LEFT HAND (HAND GRIP STRENGTH TEST)

variable.name: mri364
variable.description: WAS THIS TEST COMPLETED? (HAND GRIP STRENGTH TEST)

variable.name: mri365
variable.description: IF NOT, WHY? (HAND GRIP STRENGTH TEST)

variable.name: mridate
variable.description: NUMBER OF DAYS BETWEEN EXAM 1 AND NEUROPSYCH BATTERY TEST
